title: BATTERY FULLY DISCHARGED, UNABLE TO RECHARGE IT
content: I have tried changing power source (different wall-mount, laptop), I have tried different wires, I have cleaned the charging area, I have tried charging it for 30mins at least before trying to start it, I have tried 10mins on laptop  than remove it for 10sec and replug it, nothing seems to work. Please help. that's the second time that happens to me, first time I had ubreakifix replace my battery and now I want to try to recharge it (force it) before I again change the battery.
